Package interfaces

Interface GeneralRepositoryInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeneralRepository
    public interface GeneralRepositoryInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The General Repository, where all information is stored and logged.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void disbandAssaultParty​(int party)
      Resets the Assault Party logging details.
      void printState()
      Prints the state of the simulation to the logging file.
      void printTail​(int total)
      Prints the tail of the logging file.
      void removeAssaultPartyMember​(int party, int thief)
      Removes an Assault Party member.
      void setAssaultPartyMember​(int party, int thief, int pos, int cv)
      Sets an Assault Party member.
      void setAssaultPartyRoom​(int party, int room)
      Sets the Assault Party room target.
      void setInitialRoomStates​(int[] paintings, int[] distances)
      Sets the initial room states.
      void setInitialThieves​(int[] maxDisplacements)
      Sets the initial attributes of the thieves.
      void setMasterThiefState​(int state)
      Sets the Master Thief state.
      void setOrdinaryThiefState​(int id, int state)
      Sets the Ordinary Thief state (version 2).
      void setOrdinaryThiefState​(int id, int state, int maxDisplacement)
      Sets the Ordinary Thief state.
      void setRoomState​(int id, int paintings)
      Sets the room state.
      void setRoomState​(int id, int paintings, int distance)
      Sets the room state.
      void shutdown()
      Sends the shutdown signal to the General Repository.

    • Method Detail

      • printState

        void printState()
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Prints the state of the simulation to the logging file.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • printTail

        void printTail​(int total)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Prints the tail of the logging file.
        Parameters:
        total - number of paintings acquired
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setMasterThiefState

        void setMasterThiefState​(int state)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the Master Thief state.
        Parameters:
        state - the state code to change to
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setOrdinaryThiefState

        void setOrdinaryThiefState​(int id,
                           int state,
                           int maxDisplacement)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the Ordinary Thief state.
        Parameters:
        id - the identification of the thief
        state - the state code to change to
        maxDisplacement - the maximum displacement of the thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setOrdinaryThiefState

        void setOrdinaryThiefState​(int id,
                           int state)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the Ordinary Thief state (version 2).
        Parameters:
        id - the identification of the thief
        state - the state code to change to
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setAssaultPartyRoom

        void setAssaultPartyRoom​(int party,
                         int room)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the Assault Party room target.
        Parameters:
        party - the party number
        room - the room identification
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setAssaultPartyMember

        void setAssaultPartyMember​(int party,
                           int thief,
                           int pos,
                           int cv)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets an Assault Party member.
        Parameters:
        party - the party number
        thief - the identification of the thief
        pos - the present position of the thief
        cv - 1 if the thief is carrying a canvas, 0 otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • removeAssaultPartyMember

        void removeAssaultPartyMember​(int party,
                              int thief)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Removes an Assault Party member.
        Parameters:
        party - the identification of the Assault Party
        thief - the identification of the Ordinary Thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • disbandAssaultParty

        void disbandAssaultParty​(int party)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Resets the Assault Party logging details.
        Parameters:
        party - the party number
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setRoomState

        void setRoomState​(int id,
                  int paintings,
                  int distance)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the room state.
        Parameters:
        id - the room identification
        paintings - the number of paintings
        distance - the distance to the outside gathering site
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setRoomState

        void setRoomState​(int id,
                  int paintings)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the room state.
        Parameters:
        id - the room identification
        paintings - the number of paintings
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setInitialRoomStates

        void setInitialRoomStates​(int[] paintings,
                          int[] distances)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the initial room states.
        Parameters:
        paintings - an array with the number of paintings of each room
        distances - an array with the distance to each room
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • setInitialThieves

        void setInitialThieves​(int[] maxDisplacements)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sets the initial attributes of the thieves.
        Parameters:
        maxDisplacements - an array with the maximum displacements of the Ordinary Thieves, where the index of each value is the identification of the thief
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends the shutdown signal to the General Repository.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the execution of the remote code failed
